roleset.name: conquer, sorta
roleset.note: OVERPOWER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overpower' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from overpower.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: As Ruth, [Moira Harris, a large and beautiful woman who may be our next Colleen Dewhurst,]-2 begins almost immediately [*-2]to overpower each of the men.
